snippet.title: Love is a Game Teaser
snippet.description:
Love is a Game promotional video 2016.

If you like this video, consider checking out our KickStarter and downloading our demo!

http://kck.st/29Aem5N

Audilis' very first otome / visual novel, Love is a Game, will be released in episodic format for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, and iOS. Look for the initial prologue to hit all available platforms in the summer of 2016!

Find out more at:
http://www.audilis.com/liag

Music composed by Alyssa Menes:
http://www.acmenesmusic.com
